title: Aptora - Building Management System
description: Aptora is a modern web application for managing apartment buildings, agreements, users, and administrative operations. It streamlines apartment listings, agreement requests, coupon management, payments, and announcements for both admins and users.
briefDescription: A robust platform designed to automate and centralize apartment management tasks, from tenant requests to administrative operations.
challenges: Ensuring real-time data sync between admin and tenant dashboards
futurePlans: Add mobile app for both tenants and admins
Integrate IoT devices for real-time utility monitoring

techStack.name: React
techStack.description: Frontend library for building interactive UIs

techStack.name: Express
techStack.description: Backend framework for handling routes and APIs

bullets: Streamlined apartment listings and agreement request workflows
Integrated coupon management, payment processing, and announcements
keyFeatures: Role-based dashboards for tenants and admins
Secure online rent payment and tracking
outcome: Successfully launched with positive feedback from property managers and tenants. Increased operational efficiency by 40%.

title: ShareBite
description: ShareBite is a community-driven food sharing platform built with React, Vite, Express, and MongoDB. It enables users to share surplus food, request meals, and help reduce food waste.
briefDescription: A food-sharing network to reduce waste by connecting people who have surplus food with those in need.
challenges: Implementing real-time notifications for food availability
Creating a scalable image upload and hosting solution
Building location-based search for nearby food offers
futurePlans: Launch mobile application with offline mode
Integrate blockchain for transparent food donation tracking

techStack.name: MongoDB
techStack.description: NoSQL database for food listings and users

bullets: Enabled users to share and request food through a community marketplace
Designed for reducing food waste and connecting local communities
keyFeatures: Post and browse surplus food listings
Secure messaging between donors and recipients
Photo uploads for each food listing
outcome: Helped redistribute over 500 surplus meals in the first month of launch.

title: GardenGlee: A Community Gardening Platform
description: A comprehensive platform for gardening enthusiasts to share tips, connect with local gardeners, ask plant care questions, and participate in gardening events. GardenGlee fosters a vibrant community around shared interests such as composting, hydroponics, balcony gardening, and more.
briefDescription: A social and educational hub for gardeners to share knowledge, ask questions, and organize local events.
challenges: Designing an intuitive UI for plant-related Q&A
Building an event management system within the platform
Ensuring scalability for high traffic during seasonal gardening peaks
futurePlans: Add AI-based plant disease detection via image upload
Create a plant marketplace for seeds and tools
Integrate AR features for virtual garden planning

techStack.name: React
techStack.description: Frontend UI framework for building interactive pages

techStack.name: Express
techStack.description: API framework for handling gardening events & Q&A

techStack.name: MongoDB
techStack.description: Database for storing posts, events, and user profiles

bullets: Created a social hub for gardeners to share advice and resources
Facilitated local events and Q&A for gardening best practices

Resource sharing for tools and seeds
outcome: Built a thriving gardening community with over 1,000 active members.
